entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 09:00 AM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -15.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -17.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 2.
